Welcome to FiNN#

FiNN is a toolbox for the analysis of electrophysiological to Find Neurophysiological Networks. To this end, FiNN provides a number of methods which support the analysis of electrophysiological data. This support is expanded to a broad scope from basic digital signal processing, to file IO, statistical analysis, visualization & most importantly, a number of different metrics to evaluate same frequency connectivity and cross frequency connectivity.

FiNN was designed with primarily EEG, EMG & MEG data in mind, but can easily utilized for the analysis of related electrophysiological data.

Demo applications of the included modules are available in the finn_demo folder.
